text: A Wopbopaloobop A Lopamboom is a 1989 Luxembourgian German drama movie directed by Andy Bausch and starring Thierry van Werveke, Désirée Nosbusch, Jochen Senf, Birol Ünel, Geraldine Karier, Fernand Fox, Steve Karier. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 drama movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andy Bausch
title: A Wopbopaloobop A Lopbamboom
